roleset.name: causing damage (generally to something living)

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: My arms had started to look a mess because of my self-harming, so I decided to take action and see a counsellor.

example.name: just arg1
example.text: hello , i am a 12 year old girl -LRB- 13 in two days -RRB- who is addicted to self harming .

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, harm-v.01, harm-n.01. Corresponds to VNcls amuse-31.1.
